https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gU1eacLwCN8N5vH31RC3npzUqSp.jpg Adam a young musician had the perfect life until one day everything changed. His father, detective Joseph Gable continues on a relentless path to save Adam's soul as angels and demons are disguised as humans. This ancient spiritual war between good and evil will test their faith as a dark stranger descends on modern day Toronto. Adam's Testament
